trans-unit.source: Represents the deployment context of a specific project item.
trans-unit.target: 表示特定项目项的部署上下文。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.ISharePointProjectItemDeploymentContext> objects to determine the location of the deployed project item and its files on the server.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.ISharePointProjectItemDeploymentContext>对象以确定部署的项目项和其服务器上的文件的位置。

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio passes <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.ISharePointProjectItemDeploymentContext> objects to the event handlers for the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemEvents.DeploymentStepStarted>, <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemEvents.DeploymentStepCompleted>, and <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemTypeDefinition.ProjectItemStartupUrlRequested> events.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 将传递<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Deployment.ISharePointProjectItemDeploymentContext>的对象添加到事件处理程序<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemEvents.DeploymentStepStarted>， <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemEvents.DeploymentStepCompleted>，和<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.ISharePointProjectItemTypeDefinition.ProjectItemStartupUrlRequested>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the primary feature associated with the project item.
trans-unit.target: 获取与项目项关联的主要功能。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a SharePoint feature.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 SharePoint 功能对象。

trans-unit.source: If the project item is present in multiple features, the feature with the most specific deployment scope is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果项目项是否存在于多个功能，则使用最具体的部署范围的功能。

trans-unit.source: If multiple features have the same deployment scope, an arbitrary feature is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个功能具有相同的部署范围，则使用任意功能。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value representing the scope at which the project item's feature is being deployed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值表示正在部署的项目项的功能的范围。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a feature scope.
Gets the project item being deployed.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在部署的项目项。

trans-unit.source: An object representing a SharePoint project item.
trans-unit.target: 表示 SharePoint 项目项的对象。
